members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT CDDS_POSTPAINT (NMLVCUSTOMDRAW nmcd, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT CDDS_POSTPAINT (NMLVCUSTOMDRAW nmcd, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: +					* Feature in Windows.  When LVM_SETEXTENDEDLISTVIEWSTYLE is
+					* used to set or clear the extended style bits and the table
+					* has a tooltip, the tooltip is hidden.  The fix is to clear
+					* the tooltip before setting the bits and then reset it.
+					* Bug in Windows.  Despite the documentation, LVM_SETTOOLTIPS
+					* uses WPARAM instead of LPARAM for the new tooltip  The fix
+					* is to put the tooltip in both parameters.

members.signatureBeforeChange: private int dropProcCallback(int widget, int client_data, int call_data)
members.signatureAfterChange: private int dropProcCallback(int widget, int client_data, int call_data)
